forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 38F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 3C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Clearing late. Low 37F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
